title: 自定义回家
author: Java_command
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Java_command 于 2016-6-18 10:31 编辑 

这个东西水平也不高，只能设置一个家，总体来说还是比较好用的

输入指令后生成建筑并获得三样东西


从左到右（我这里）分别是清除家，回到家和设置家。使用方法很简单，扔出去就行了。
但是这个东西只能设置1个家，如果超过1个再回去就没有用了，所以如果出现这种情况只能把他们清除。在没有任何家的时候清除和传送扔出去都是没有效果的。
我的水平也不高，这个东西也就这么多，毕竟电脑用不了OOC生成也是花了几个小时才弄好的，接下来把指令放一下



/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Block:redstone_block,Time:1,Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Block:activator_rail,Time:1,Passengers:[{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/gamerule commandBlockOutput false},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/fill ~-3 ~2 ~-1 ~3 ~2 ~1 quartz_block},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/scoreboard objectives add SHome dummy},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/scoreboard objectives add BHome dummy},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/scoreboard objectives add KHome dummy},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/fill ~-3 ~6 ~-1 ~3 ~6 ~1 quartz_block},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/fill ~-3 ~3 ~-1 ~3 ~5 ~1 stained_glass_pane 3},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/setblock ~-2 ~3 ~ repeating_command_block 5 1 {auto:1b,Command:/scoreboard players set @e[type=Item] SHome 1 {Item:{id:"minecraft:blaze_rod",tag:{ench:[],display:{Name:设置家}}}}}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/setblock ~-1 ~3 ~ chain_command_block 5 1 {auto:1b,Command:/execute @e[type=Item,score_SHome_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /summon ArmorStand ~ ~ ~ {Invisible:1b,CustomName:Home,NoGravity:1b,Marker:1}}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/setblock ~ ~3 ~ chain_command_block 13 1 {auto:1b,Command:/kill @e[type=Item,score_SHome_min=1]}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/setblock ~1 ~3 ~ chain_command_block 13 1 {auto:1b,Command:/give @p minecraft:blaze_rod 1 0 {ench:[],display:{Name:设置家}}}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/setblock ~2 ~3 ~ chain_command_block 13 1 {auto:1b,Command:/tellraw @p [{"text":"已设置家.","color":"yellow"}]}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/setblock ~-2 ~4 ~ repeating_command_block 5 1 {auto:1b,Command:/scoreboard players set @e[type=Item] BHome 1 {Item:{id:"minecraft:stick",tag:{ench:[],display:{Name:回到家}}}}}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/setblock ~-1 ~4 ~ chain_command_block 5 1 {auto:1b,Command:/execute @e[type=Item,score_BHome_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /tp @p @e[type=ArmorStand,name=Home]}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/setblock ~ ~4 ~ chain_command_block 13 1 {auto:1b,Command:/kill @e[type=Item,score_BHome_min=1]}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/setblock ~1 ~4 ~ chain_command_block 13 1 {auto:1b,Command:/give @p minecraft:stick 1 0 {ench:[],display:{Name:回到家}}}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/setblock ~2 ~4 ~ chain_command_block 13 1 {auto:1b,Command:/tellraw @p [{"text":"已回到家.","color":"green"}]}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/setblock ~-2 ~5 ~ repeating_command_block 5 1 {auto:1b,Command:/scoreboard players set @e[type=Item] KHome 1 {Item:{id:"minecraft:tnt",tag:{ench:[],display:{Name:清除家}}}}}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/setblock ~-1 ~5 ~ chain_command_block 5 1 {auto:1b,Command:/execute @e[type=Item,score_KHome_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /kill @e[type=ArmorStand,name=Home]}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/setblock ~ ~5 ~ chain_command_block 13 1 {auto:1b,Command:/kill @e[type=Item,score_KHome_min=1]}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/setblock ~1 ~5 ~ chain_command_block 13 1 {auto:1b,Command:/give @p minecraft:tnt 1 0 {ench:[],display:{Name:清除家}}}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/setblock ~2 ~5 ~ chain_command_block 13 1 {auto:1b,Command: /tellraw @p [{"text":"已清除家.","color":"red"}]}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/tellraw @a [{"text":"自定义回家By Java_command"}]},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/tellraw @a [{"text":"所有物品扔出使用"}]}, {id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/tellraw @a [{"text":"mcbbs地址：","color":"yellow"},{"text":"  网页链接(点击)  ","color":"blue","clickEvent":{"action":"open_url","value":"http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-589907-1-1.html"}},{"text":"请支持作者！","color":"red"}]},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/give @p minecraft:tnt 1 0 {ench:[],display:{Name:清除家}}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/give @p minecraft:blaze_rod 1 0 {ench:[],display:{Name:设置家}}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/give @p minecraft:stick 1 0 {ench:[],display:{Name:回到家}}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/setblock ~ ~-2 ~ chain_command_block 0 1 {auto:1b,Command:/fill ~ ~ ~ ~ ~2 ~ air}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/setblock ~ ~-1 ~ command_block 0 1 {auto:1b,Command:/kill @e[type=MinecartCommandBlock]}}]}]}复制代码

replies.author: LBL_CB
replies.txt_content: 不错，只不过有些不足的地方，设置家的时候最好把那个AS生成时并tp到玩家那，这样可以做到回家时视角也做到自定义。而且家那个AS最好使用Marker标签，生存真的使用的时候，家传送点不至于挡住旁边的方块

marker只是没hitbox，不代表隐形。你需要Invisible
